question:
Identify the personality with the help of given information:
  1. He started Bombay Chronicle, an English-language weekly newspaper
  2. He was known as The Lion of Bombay
  3. He was one of the founders of the Indian National Congress and its president at Calcutta session of 1890
   Select the correct answer from options given below:
explanation: Sir Pherozeshah Mehta was a Parsi Indian political leader. He started Bombay Chronicle, an English-language weekly newspaper. He was known as The Lion of Bombay. He was one of the founders of the Indian National Congress and its president at Calcutta session of 1890.
